description:
Wikstrom`s Escavalier appeared in the second round of the The Castle of Chivalry training trial from behind a wall and attacked Goh`s Scyther.
It had a training battle with Drasna`s Altaria just before Drasna would face off against Ash Ketchum in a Pok√©mon World Championships Hyper Class battle. The battle ended when Drasna`s Altaria used Heat Wave on Escavalier causing it to visibly steam.
name: Chevargo (Ganpi)
